Invent your own forms of entertainment: With no external sources of entertainment, you could use your imagination and creativity to come up with new and unique ways to entertain yourself. This could include creating your own games, writing stories, drawing, painting, or even making your own music.

Engage in physical activities: Without the distractions of screens and other forms of entertainment, you could use your time to engage in physical activities such as exercise, dancing, or playing sports. This can be a great way to clear your mind and improve your physical health.
Learn a new skill: You could use your time to learn a new skill, such as cooking, woodworking, or playing an instrument. This can be a great way to challenge yourself and learn something new.

Spend time with friends and family: Without entertainment, you could spend more time with the people around you. You could plan a game night, have a movie marathon, or simply enjoy each other's company.

Take a break from technology: In today's world, it's easy to become reliant on technology for entertainment. You could use this opportunity to take a break from screens and other devices and spend some time in nature, read a book, or simply enjoy the silence and peacefulness of your surroundings.
